system.description:
At level 14, the sight of you is enough to make fortification engineers despair. Your spells deal double damage to objects and structures. 

Also, when you take the Attack action, you can substitute any number of your attacks with a cantrip of the weaponry school. When you cast two or more cantrips in the same Attack action,  you cannot cast any more spells until the end of your turn. You cannot use this feature if you already cast a spell this turn.
